DOC.brief_title: BRAND'S® Essence Chicken Promotion Resilience Resistance Stress-associated Cognitive Inhibition
DOC.detailed_description: This placebo-controlled , randomize , double-blind trial . There 100 subject . Subjects randomly assign either placebo BRAND'S® Essence Chicken ( BEC ) , 70cc daily 2 week , group . Stress test , cognitive function assessment blood test carry Week 0 , Week 2 , Week 4 ( 2 week termination supplementation ) . The primary end-point better improvement cognitive function supplement BEC placebo . The second endpoint include improvement global health survey change biomarkers related stress immunity .
